name: Silver Flash Pinball
overview: Silver Flash Pinball 1 is a black and white pinball game for the TRS-80, which allows for 1 - 4 players. The ball is launched from the top right of the screen. The game features a single pinball game with 4 flippers, shake control, and a tilt mechanism. The top score for all 4 players is displayed on the right of the screen. Each player gets 3 balls per game
